[http://sioc-project.org/ SIOC (Semantically-Interlinked Online Communities)] is an initiative that aims to enable the integration of online community information. AO integrates with SIOC as follows.

Some of the SIOC classes of interest are:

 * sioc:Item: An Item is something which can be in a Container. 
 * sioc:Container: An area in which content Items are contained. 
 * sioctypes:[http://rdfs.org/sioc/types#AnnotationSet AnnotationSet]: Describes a set of annotations, for example, those created by a particular user or related to a particular topic.
